channel.title: Bengal Cricket on BalleWale Cricket News
channel.description: Recent content in Bengal Cricket on BalleWale Cricket News

item.title: Nabi Takes Seven; Gharami's Unbeaten Ton Keeps Bengal Afloat
item.description: Mohammad Nabi's seven-wicket haul and Sudip Gharami's century helped Bengal fight back in their latest domestic match.

item.title: Gharami's Unbeaten Ton Keeps Bengal Afloat Against Andhra
item.description: Bengal's Gharami scores a crucial unbeaten century to secure a draw against Andhra in the Ranji Trophy match.
